profile_summary: Proficient in **Project Management**, with a strong emphasis on **Problem Solving**, **Teamwork**, and **Communication**, bringing over 13 years of experience in engineering and technical project execution. Demonstrated ability to manage complex site investigations and design processes within the geotechnical field while ensuring compliance with industry standards. Adept in delivering projects that integrate advanced engineering principles and collaborate seamlessly with multidisciplinary teams. Additionally, I possess a robust background in Full Stack Development, skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in leveraging cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices architectures. My technical portfolio also includes AI/ML platforms developed for predictive analytics, alongside a strong adherence to compliance with regulations such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
